entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Saint Andrews
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:33 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Point Lepreau 2:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023
Temperature: 0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: -0.4°C
Wind: NNE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Rain. Temperature steady near zero except near plus 2 over Grand Manan Island.
entry.summary: Rain or ice pellets with risk of freezing rain. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm except 15 mm over Grand Manan Island. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near zero except near plus 2 over Grand Manan Island. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy or rain. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Rain or ice pellets changing to snow at times heavy this evening and ending overnight then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023
